description: '''Ferdinando "Fred" Buscaglione''' ({{IPA|it|ˈfrɛd buskaʎˈʎoːne}}; 23 November 1921 – 3 February 1960) was an Italian singer and actor who became very popular in the late 1950s. His public persona – the character he played both in his songs and his movies – was of a humorous mobster with a penchant for whisky and women.
